name: Angel Feathers
description:
Become an employee of Icarus Postal Service. The heroic messengers of the Gods. 

While Heaven and Hell continue to wage their war on the surface,  No conditions are too tough for the loyal members of the IPS.  Swipe your way through 4 unique locations collecting lost packages. Improve your high score by completing Bonus objectives to unlock new characters with special abilities, and become the perfect delivery angel!

With charming visuals and captivating music that changes based on stage progress, your new career with the Icarus Postal Service will be a rewarding one. 

Made for ease of play with a 1-handed control scheme and fast-paced stages, Angel Feathers is a easy pick up and play game for whenever you have the urge to make an angelic delivery!

Coming soon to Google Play Store!!

(Android  only right now)

Programmer, character, level & mechanic design - Sean O'Connor

Music and Sound Effects - Nathan Hansen (Sound Cloud)

Abyss Stage Art - Sîrbu Anastasia Dalia

Title / Tower of Babel Stage Art - Merly

Route Sixty Styx Art and Art consultant - Aislyn lapp / ashlynnispaniking

Thunderhead Atage Art - Mindy Van
